content: Hey, I want to fix my faucet and electric outlets. How much do you charge?
Hello! I can help you with plumbing and electrical services. To assist further, could you please provide your name?
You guys are awesome! Get rich quick info! Call me! Click here: http://fake.link
It seems you are sending spam messages. For your safety and ours, we will need to end this conversation now. If you have legitimate service needs, please contact us again.
